contentrichtext.text: {{BLP sources|date=June 2010}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Mitsuru Igarashi | background =non_vocal_instrumentalist | image = | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject Musicians --> | birth_name = | alias = | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1969|05|17|mf=y}} |birth_place =[[Tokyo]] | death_date = | origin = | instrument = | genre = [[J-Pop|Japanese Pop]] | occupation = [[Keyboardist]], [[record producer]] | years_active = | label = [[Avex Trax]] | associated_acts = [[Every Little Thing (band)|Every Little Thing]], [[Day After Tomorrow (band)|Day After Tomorrow]] | website = [http://iggy326.syncl.jp/ Mitsuru Igarashi Official Blog] | notable_instruments = }} {{Nihongo|'''Mitsuru Igarashi'''|五十嵐 充|Igarashi Mitsuru|born May 17, 1969 in [[Tokyo]]}} is the former keyboarder and songwriter of Japanese pop group [[Every Little Thing (band)|Every Little Thing]].<ref>{{cite web|url={{Allmusic|class=artist|id=p228312/biography|pure_url=yes}}|title=Biography: Every Little Thing|last=Hickey|first=David|publisher=[[Allmusic]]|accessdate=5 June 2010}}</ref> He founded the band in early 1996 with his old friend [[Ichirō Itō]] and then 18-year-old singer [[Kaori Mochida]]. He left Every Little Thing in April 2000 after releasing the third album, ''Eternity''. Since leaving the band, he started producing [[music]] for the band [[day after tomorrow (band)|Day After Tomorrow]] which disbanded in 2005. Currently he plays keyboards and is a songmaker and producer in band Rushmore. He was also involved in composing and writing song lyrics for Every Little Thing's ninth album, ''Change''. == References == {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.avexnet.or.jp/rushmore/index.html Rushmore official website] * [http://iggy326.syncl.jp/ Official blog] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Igarashi, Mitsuru | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Japanese musician | DATE OF BIRTH =May 17, 1969 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Tokyo]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Igarashi, Mitsuru}} [[Category:1969 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Japanese musicians]] {{Japan-musician-stub}}
